name: RebajaTusCuentas
description: Making it less painful to ask for mortgages is the mission of RebajaTusCuentas. All without goin to the bank.
shortDescription: A financial platform built for scale and accessibility

name: Stadio
description: A great collaborative solution for runners. Lima? Sao Paulo? Let's run together!

summary.description: It is true that the pandemic transformed us and we can no longer meet friends to jog. Stadio has taken it as an emblem to jog with friends in other cities or countries. It works basically like a room to zoom in and out for a jog! In his first month of MVP he worked with 100 people and it was amazing to see his performance.

sectionOne.description: Check second by second how you perform against other competitors in the same race. May the fastest win!
sectionOne.title: Motivation for running on your wrist

sectionTwo.description: You can organize sessions with friends or participate in other rooms with people from other cities or countries. Training has never been so much fun
sectionTwo.title: Create rooms or join in running with strangers

impactSection.description: Taking into account that the main running apps have not developed this feature very well. These were the results:
impactSection.title: Impact on people
